col-gap--xs[innerblocks].title: Tiny column gap
col-gap--xs[innerblocks].description: Adds a tiny gap between columns.

col-gap--sm[innerblocks].title: Small column gap
col-gap--sm[innerblocks].description: Adds a small gap between columns.

col-gap--md[innerblocks].title: Medium column gap
col-gap--md[innerblocks].description: Adds a medium gap between columns.

col-gap--lg[innerblocks].title: Large column gap
col-gap--lg[innerblocks].description: Adds a large gap between columns.

col-gap--xl[innerblocks].title: Extra-large column gap
col-gap--xl[innerblocks].description: Adds an extra-large gap between columns.

col-gap--xxl[innerblocks].title: Huge column gap
col-gap--xxl[innerblocks].description: Adds a huge gap between columns.
